definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The trombone is an essential musical instrument for a symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 拉管是交響樂隊不可缺少的樂器之一。

sentences.english: The paper will generally analyze and discuss the non-digging pulling pipe construction technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文將針對非開挖拉管施工技術進行整體的分析探討。

sentences.english: These stretchy tubes offer weight-like resistance when you pull on them.
sentences.chinese: 這些拉管可以有很重的阻力，你可以拉拉它。

definition: to widen a tube/to ream (i.e. widen a hole)
to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
die (i.e. tool for cutting wire to a given diameter)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
